data.name: Agile Scrum Core
data.description: Sprint-focused delivery metrics for Scrum teams: velocity, throughput, WIP limits, and defect tracking.

data.description: Flow-based metrics for Kanban teams: cycle time, throughput, WIP, and risk awareness.

data.name: Hybrid Core
data.description: Cross-method KPIs for hybrid projects: flow metrics, cost tracking, risk, and change management.
